structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
URBAN SERVICES DISTRICTS -- AMBULANCE SERVICE DISTRICTS

text.section: An urban services district is prohibited from providing sanitation service that is being provided in the same area by a sanitation district as of June 16, 1960.

law.history: Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 150, sec. 2, effective June 16, 1960.
